channel.title: Sensr.net Blog | Watch your Stuff!
channel.description: Recent content on Sensr.net Blog | Watch your Stuff!

item.title: ReadWriteWeb Article on Sensr.net
item.description:
ReadWriteWeb’s Richard MacManus just wrote an excellent, detailed article on Sensr.net — and it’s clear he really gets us. You can head over to RWW for the full article, but here are some significant highlights:

  • Sensr.net processes 1.1 terabytes of data every day
  • We’re growing ~15% every month in cameras
  • 20% conversion rate from Fremium to Premium plans
  • Sensr.net is smart about storing data, saving 1/10th of the video uploaded
  • Sensr.net makes Richard MacManus’s spidey senses tingle!

Thanks for the wonderful article, and as usual, thanks to our great users for helping us continue to grow.
